channel.title: How do I change max stats and combat from 99 to a higher level?
channel.description: I've been wondering this for a while. i want to change the max stats from 99 to, oh lets say, 150, and the max combat to, maybe, 250? And, if possible, is there any way I can make admin levels higher than the max level, combat and skills?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 07:45:00 PM[/size][hr]Oh, I apologize, I didn't see the previous topic from another guy... well, can anyone answer anyway, since there was no answer in that post? :rolleyes:[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 07:46:01 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? Please, I need to have it before I get my server running tomorrow...

item.title: How do I change max stats and combat from 99 to a higher level?
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

find that in player.java and edit the 99 to whatever changes the stat lvl 135 should make combat bout 253 or somthing.

Read full topic
